channel.title: Omscs on Eric Porter
channel.description: Recent content in Omscs on Eric Porter

item.title: Preparing for OMSCS - Fall 2017
item.description: I will be starting the Georgia Tech OMSCS program this fall. It has been a while since I’ve been in school, so I put together a simple refresher course based on the feedback from reddit, google+, and omscentral. Hopefully my thought process can be helpful to others. Obviously preparation will vary depending on individual goals and background. I’ll update early in the first semester with feedback and what I wish I would have known.
